page.title: 15Family Possesions
page.content: Information about family possesions compiled from our questionaire.Of the 80 houses we interviewed only 20 had videos.Five people out of the lot had black and white T.V's others had colours.Forty five families had a car, seven had caravans or tents and 14 had computers.Every family with a computer had children.Most of the families had pets whether they had children or not. Only thirteen families didn't have a pet.Most people had one pet only.Few families had hamsters,ferrets,rabbits or budgies.More people had dogs or cats than anything else.Almost all the children had a bike.
